DOC.brief_summary: In this study, a functional evaluation of total knee arthroplasty (TKA) patients is performed. The patients are measured prior to surgery and 6 and 12 months after surgery. The measurements consist of questionnaires and rising from a chair. Also, two types of TKA are functionally evaluated. At last, the TKA group will be compared to a THP group.
DOC.brief_title: Functional Evaluation of the Total Knee Prostheses:Rising From a Chair
DOC.criteria: unilateral TKA TKA bilateral recent THP movement disorders like Parkinson's disease, insults, that disturb equilibrium and movements
